mapper.sql: a.id AS "id" , a.title AS "title" , a.business_type AS "businessType" , a.method AS "method" , a.request_method AS "requestMethod" , a.operator_type AS "operatorType" , a.oper_name AS "operName" , a.comp_name AS "compName" , a.oper_url AS "operUrl" , a.oper_ip AS "operIp" , a.oper_location AS "operLocation" , a.oper_param AS "operParam" , a.json_result AS "jsonResult" , a.status AS "status" , a.error_msg AS "errorMsg" , a.oper_time AS "operTime" , a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.time AS "time" , a.comp_id AS "compId" , a.dept_id AS "deptId"
LEFT JOIN sys_comp c ON c.id = a.comp_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,parent_ids FROM sys_comp) d ON a.dept_id = d.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_oper_log a
AND a.title LIKE
'%,'||#{title}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.oper_name LIKE
'%,'||#{operName}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{operName}, '%')
AND a.status = '${status}'
AND (FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId},d.parent_ids) AND ('${deptId}' = ANY(STRING_TO_ARRAY(d.parent_ids, ',')) AND (INSTR(','||d.parent_ids||',',',${deptId},') > 0 AND (CHARINDEX(','+'${deptId}'+',', ','+d.parent_ids+',') > 0 OR a.dept_id = '${deptId}')
AND a.business_type IN(${businessTypes})
AND date_format(a.oper_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(a.oper_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND a.oper_time >= '${beginTime}'::TIMESTAMP
AND a.oper_time < ('${endTime}'::TIMESTAMP + '1 DAY')
AND ${sql_filter}
GROUP BY a.id,a.oper_time
